description: Show an overview of the system resources

targets.query: SELECT last("usage_steal") AS "steal", last("usage_system") AS "system", last("usage_user") AS "user", last("usage_iowait") AS "iowait", last("usage_idle") AS "idle", last("usage_guest") AS "guest", last("usage_guest_nice") AS "guest nice", last("usage_irq") AS "irq", last("usage_nice") AS "nice" FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host"

list.name: interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE "host" = '$host'

list.name: path
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "path" WHERE "host" = '$host'

list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE "host" = '$host'

title: Host overview
